# VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation

**Class**

An observation that provides the 3D body points the request recognizes.

## Declaration

```swift
class VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation
```

## Accessing Points

- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointName**: The joint names for a 3D body pose.
- **availableJointsGroupNames**: The available joint group names in the observation.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointsGroupName**: The joint group names for a 3D body pose.
- **recognizedPoint(_:)**: Returns the point for a joint name that the observation recognizes.
- **recognizedPoints(_:)**: Returns a collection of points for the group name you specify.

## Getting the Joint Position

- **pointInImage(_:)**: Returns a 2D point for the joint name you specify, relative to the input image.

## Getting the Parent Joint Name

- **parentJointName(_:)**: Returns the parent joint of the joint name you specify.

## Getting the Body Height

- **heightEstimation**: The technique the framework uses to estimate body height.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.HeightEstimation**: Constants that identify body height estimation techniques.
- **bodyHeight**: The estimated human body height, in meters.

## Getting the Camera Position

- **cameraOriginMatrix**: A transform from the skeleton hip to the camera.
- **cameraRelativePosition(_:)**: Returns a position relative to the camera for the body joint you specify.

## 3D body pose detection

- **Identifying 3D human body poses in images**: Detect three-dimensional human body poses using the Vision framework.
- **Detecting human body poses in 3D with Vision**: Render skeletons of 3D body pose points in a scene overlaying the input image.
- **VNDetectHumanBodyPose3DRequest**: A request that detects points on human bodies in 3D space, relative to the camera.
- **VNRecognizedPoints3DObservation**: An observation that provides the 3D points for a request.
- **VNHumanBodyRecognizedPoint3D**: A recognized 3D point that includes a parent joint.
- **VNPoint3D**: An object that represents a 3D point in an image.
- **VNRecognizedPoint3D**: A 3D point that includes an identifier to the point.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointName**: The joint names for a 3D body pose.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointsGroupName**: The joint group names for a 3D body pose.

## Inherits From

- VNRecognizedPoints3DObservation

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- VNRequestRevisionProviding
